Hi J.B,

I am on the other side of the shore and believe in Code coverage and so 
very interested in knowing why you feel that 100% code coverage isn't a 
requirement for code check in?  Can you please share your thoughts?

Thanks & Regards,
Sachin Dholakia





"J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> 
Sent by: junit@yahoogroups.com
11/15/2005 07:08 PM
Please respond to
junit@yahoogroups.com


To
junit@yahoogroups.com
cc

Subject
Re: [junit] coverage testing






Eugene Kuleshov wrote:

>   I'd like to hear opinions on the idea of raising test failures for
> code not covered by tests right from the tests.

I might find it useful, but I don't think I'd want the Coverage suite 
running with my programmer tests, because I don't believe that 100% 
coverage (whatever that means) is a requirement to check code in.
--
